transcript:
Customer: Dekho aaj dimaag me khilkar suraj nikal raha hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Mukesh ji namaste.
Executive: Namaste.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha sir India Mart se baat kar sakte hai sir abhi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan main keh raha tha sir maine discuss kiya Avnish se theek hai unhone mujhe diya Kalyani Enterprises ka theek hai na client ka naam Gokul karke hai hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan sahi hai.
Executive: Haan to sir humne unka profile check kiya maine sir unhone sir apna MSC MS certificate se leke GST certificate se leke sara cheez unhone sir pura ka pura detail provide kiya hua hai sir apna company ka sign board se leke sara cheez sir proper jo ek account open karne ke liye jo document ki need hoti hai sir.
Customer: Problem wo main aapko wo bola hi nahi na unhone GST me diya ye nahi mera concern kya tha?
Executive: Aapka jo concern tha na sir ki aapka product ka unhone copy kiya.
Customer: Sir ek uska baat kijiye aap baki mujhe ye mat bataiye unhone naya dhoya khaya piya hazaam uta ye sab mujhe pata hai.
Executive: Main wo cheez nahi bata raha hu sir.
Customer: Kya discuss kiya tha maine?
Executive: Wo uska kya hai aap bataiye.
Executive: Ab sir koi bhi agar aap keh rahe ho ki aapka product matlab aapka database unhone sir chori kiya hai aap se ye cheez aap keh rahe ho na sir wo aapka employee tha aapka database unhone chori karke aapka se paas se chala gaya sir to usme hum kis tarike se aapki help kar sakte hai aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Aap nahi kar sakte to aap chhod dijiye baar baar call mat kijiye theek hai?
Executive: To sir abhi aapne sir not satisfied ka bhi hamare paas feedback diya hai sir.
Customer: Not satisfied not satisfied hai wo to zindagi bhar rahega not satisfied hi.
Executive: Ab sir isme India Mart ka kya issue hai ye to bataiye sir India Mart aapko kaise help karega?
Customer: India Mart sirf paisa paisa lene ke liye India Mart ethically way me kaam nahi karta hai.
Executive: Abhi unhone jo.
Customer: India Mart sirf paisa important hai.
Executive: Abhi mujhe ye bataiye sir ki unhone pneumatic grease guns wagera jo product deal kar matlab add karke rakha hua hai sir jis brand ka bhi unhone add kiya hoga sir hamare paas unka unke paas product ka brochure wagera bhi unhone hame provide kiya hai sir RROZ Groz Groz naam hai company ka sir.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Sir Groz Groz naam hai sir company ka jinse unhone liya hua hai sir.
Customer: Authorization liya kya aapne authorization?
Executive: Authorization matlab bataiye kaise?
Customer: Ki aap Groz company ka karte ho dealership certificate wagera hai kya aapke paas liya kya aapne?
Executive: Sir unhone diya hoga hamare paas sir brand promotion wagera sari cheeze sir tabhi to hum usko.
Customer: Ye ye aap.
Executive: Main main check karke bata bhi de raha hu sir ek minute ek hawa me nahi sir maine abhi documents related aapse baat kiya sir aap.
Customer: Chhod dijiye sir thank you.
Executive: Main check kar le raha hu sir hold the call sir check kar le raha hu sir uske liye aap nishchit rahiye sir jo bhi cheez unhone.
Customer: Please baar baar call mat kijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer alleges data theft by a client.

- Feels IndiaMART is unethical, only wants money.

- Unhappy with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check client's documents.

- Executive tried to understand the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- data theft, unethical practices, client verification
